Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Instrument display flickering. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 12/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
